p_doc.encoder: HP HEDS-5640-A06 optical quadrature encoder. TODO
p_doc.display: Parallax 27979 LED dot-matrix display. An 80-character LCD transreflective dot-matrix display. It has four 20-character lines and each character has $5 \times 8$ dots. The serial interface is natural for UART communication. It requires a $5$ V supply.
